name: John Frieda Frizz Ease Extra Strength Hair Serum, Instantly Smooths for Healthy, Hydrated, Frizz-Free Hair, for Thick and Coarse Hair, with Argan + Coconut Oil for Heat Protection, 1.69 Oz, Pack of 2
short_description: ANTI FRIZZ HAIR SERUM - With an updated formula, fall in love with this iconic serum, which can now be used for not just wet but dry hair Nourishing unmanageable, frizzy hair and leaving locks with a silky, smooth finish

ANTI FRIZZ HAIR SERUM - With an updated formula, fall in love with this iconic serum, which can now be used for not just wet but dry hair Nourishing unmanageable, frizzy hair and leaving locks with a silky, smooth finish
HAIR SMOOTHING - Carefully formulated with hydrating Argan, Coconut, and Moringa extracts, this weightless, anti-frizz hair serum is formulated for dry, damaged hair
CRUELTY FREE - Our serum is suitable for use on natural, color-treated, or highlighted hair
product_description: John Frieda Frizz Ease Extra Strength Serum anti-frizz hair product is known for its iconic frizz-fighting abilities, but it does so much more. And now, with a new look and updated iconic formula, fall in love with this cult classic hair serum. In addition to eliminating frizz, a dime-sized amount of this hair serum for frizzy and damaged hair can prevent damage from heat styling, repel humidity, smooth strands, hydrate, and tame unruly flyaways. This all-in-one hydrating hair product is infused with argan, coconut, and moringa oils. This serum works to instantly transform wild, unmanageable hair into gorgeous, silky locks. This frizzy hair product offers hair protection from heat, with humidity fighting properties that prevent damage and lock in moisture for optimal frizz control. Combat unmanageable, coarse, thick, wavy hair with an anti frizz hair serum that offers nourishment and hydration for your sleek locks. Discover why our Frizz Ease serum is so popular as a hair smoother for frizzy hair, with a lightweight, weightless finish and softer, healthier style. SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – To submit a Guarantee request, please call the customer care number printed on the back label of the product package and have information available regarding the store or online retailer from which you purchased your product.

short_description: Lightweight & Non-Greasy – Worried about greasy hair? This hair shine serum smooths strands without weighing it down. Hair looks polished, soft, and manageable with a natural, weightless finish.
